counterlist.query: SELECT DebuggingRequests, EngineFlushNotifications, ErrorsDuringScriptRuntime, ErrorsFromASPPreprocessor, ErrorsFromScriptCompilers, ErrorsPerSec, InMemoryTemplateCacheHitRate, InMemoryTemplateCacheHitRate_Base, InMemoryTemplatesCached, RequestBytesInTotal, RequestBytesOutTotal, RequestExecutionTime, RequestsDisconnected, RequestsExecuting, RequestsFailedTotal, RequestsNotAuthorized, RequestsNotFound, RequestsPerSec, RequestsQueued, RequestsRejected, RequestsSucceeded, RequestsTimedOut, RequestsTotal, RequestWaitTime, ScriptEngineCacheHitRate, ScriptEngineCacheHitRate_Base, ScriptEnginesCached, SessionDuration, SessionsCurrent, SessionsTimedOut, SessionsTotal, TemplateCacheHitRate, TemplateCacheHitRate_Base, TemplateNotifications, TemplatesCached, TransactionsAborted, TransactionsCommitted, TransactionsPending, TransactionsPerSec, TransactionsTotal FROM Win32_PerfRawData_ASP_ActiveServerPages

SELECT DebuggingRequests, ErrorsDuringScriptRuntime, ErrorsFromASPPreprocessor, ErrorsFromScriptCompilers, ErrorsPerSec, InMemoryTemplateCacheHitRate, InMemoryTemplatesCached, RequestBytesInTotal, RequestBytesOutTotal, RequestExecutionTime, RequestsDisconnected, RequestsExecuting, RequestsFailedTotal, RequestsNotAuthorized, RequestsNotFound, RequestsPerSec, RequestsQueued, RequestsRejected, RequestsSucceeded, RequestsTimedOut, RequestsTotal, RequestWaitTime, ScriptEnginesCached, SessionDuration, SessionsCurrent, SessionsTimedOut, SessionsTotal, TemplateCacheHitRate, TemplateNotifications, TemplatesCached, TransactionsAborted, TransactionsCommitted, TransactionsPending, TransactionsPerSec, TransactionsTotal FROM Win32_PerfFormattedData_ASP_ActiveServerPages
